body.p: 1. Levite, son of Amasai, and ancestor of Heman the temple singer in David’s time (1 Chr 6:35).
2. Levite who assisted in the cleansing of the temple during Hezekiah’s time (2 Chr 29:12). He was appointed an overseer of the contributions, the tithes, and the things dedicated to God (31:13).
